subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

PARIS HILTON APPEALS!
Paris Hilton's
lawyers have taken the first steps toward appealing her 45-day
jail sentence for violating her probation. Will she win? What
about taking responsibility for her actions? And why is her
publicist back at her side, after she blamed her legal troubles
on him? All the latest, tonight on TV's most provocative
entertainment news show.

HASSELHOFF'S HASSLE
A judge suspends David Hasselhoff's visitation
rights with his children, after a videotape is released showing
Hasselhoff drunk and incoherent. Did the judge make the
decision? Plus, Hasselhoff's wife speaks out, in one of the
nastiest divorce battles ever!

SECRETS TO BEING A
BIG STAR!
Paris Hilton is the best example of "famous
for nothing," so Showbiz Tonight has some advice for her -- the
secrets of how to be a real star. How do celebrities
like Angelina Jolie, George Clooney, and Nicole Kidman get on
top and stay on top? The answer tonight, on Showbiz
Tonight! 

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY:
Hasselhoff loses visitation rights: Was it the right call?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT.

VIDEO EMAIL!

Day on video. Look into your camera and tell us what you think.
Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To send your video
email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video responses
on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline Prime.
